message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase this amazing product. I believe it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to start the conversation at $1200000, which is the minimum I'm willing to accept.

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm not comfortable with the initial price. I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
